sentences.sContent: The effect of his new method is imponderable.
sentences.sContent_eng: The effect of his new method is imponderable.
sentences.sCn: 他的新方法所起的作用是无法正确估计的。

sentences.sContent: Our resources in technical knowledge are imponderable.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our resources in technical knowledge are imponderable.
sentences.sCn: 我们的技术知识资源是无法估量的。

sentences.sContent: Our imponderable resources in knowledge are constantly growing and are inexhaustible.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our imponderable resources in knowledge are constantly growing and are inexhaustible.
sentences.sCn: 我们无法估量的知识资源是不断发展永不枯竭的。

remMethod.val: im(不) + ponder(仔细考量) + able → 无法衡量的
